title: Question about back propagation in time-delayed recurrent models
body_html:
The full question is available here: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/35733302/back-propagation-in-tensorflow

The question concerns whether I would have to implement a custom backward step in order to create something similar to the clockwork model. In the event that I would, I was wondering if there is reference code for how I might properly go about it.

Thank you in advance for your support.
body_text:
The full question is available here: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/35733302/back-propagation-in-tensorflow

body:
The full question is available here: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/35733302/back-propagation-in-tensorflow

The question concerns whether I would have to implement a custom backward step in order to create something similar to the [clockwork model](http://jmlr.org/proceedings/papers/v32/koutnik14.pdf). In the event that I would, I was wondering if there is reference code for how I might properly go about it.

Thank you in advance for your support.
